exam.question: We’ll visit Europe next year ________ we have enough money.

answer.explain: 句意：  如果有足够的钱， 我们明年会去欧洲旅行。lest：  唯恐； 以免； until：  直到…才， 一般用作not...until； unless：  除非。

sentences.sContent: He can come with us, provided he pays for his own meals.
sentences.sCn: 只要他付自己的饭钱，就可以跟我们一起来。

sentences.sContent: ...It was fisherman and farmers who provided fresh food that tasted and looked like food...
...It provided an opportunity for young people from all over the world to better understand China...
...public schools provided far better education than private ones...
...But their beds were provided by private individuals...
...Space probes have provided evidence that Europa has a large ocean under its surface...
...shopping assistants often provided free plastic bags for our convenience...
